text_prompt: A warmly lit, realistic scene of Pamela celebrating Christmas at home. She wears festive holiday clothing — a red knit sweater or cozy Christmas outfit — standing beside a beautifully decorated tree glowing with lights and ornaments. She smiles softly, not looking directly at the camera. She gently turns her head toward the tree, then back toward the camera with a warm expression as she says, <S>Hi, I’m Pamela — wishing you a cozy and magical Christmas.<E>. She briefly glances down at a gift in her hands, then looks up with a brighter smile and adds, <S>Enjoy the holidays, everyone!<E>. Candles, fairy lights, and wrapped presents create a soft, warm atmosphere around her. <AUDCAP>Warm, clear female voice; soft Christmas instrumental music in the background — gentle bells, light piano, and subtle room ambience.<ENDAUDCAP>
